mapper.select: /* premiumMember.selectMembershipList */ SELECT userNo, userId, userNm, preType, payPrice, sendSms, sendMail, createDt, updateDt, startDt, expireDt, checkYn, result, mberSttus FROM ( SELECT SEQ userNo, MEM_ID userId, B.MBER_NM userNm, PRE_TYPE preType, PAY_PRICE payPrice, SEND_SMS sendSms, SEND_MAIL sendMail, DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DT,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') createDt, DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DT,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') updateDt, B.MEMBERSHIP_START_DT startDt, B.MEMBERSHIP_EXPIRE_DT expireDt, A.CHECK_YN checkYn, A.RESULT result, B.MBER_STTUS mberSttus FROM membershipreglog A JOIN comtngnrlmber B ON MEM_ID = B.MBER_ID ) AA ORDER BY userNo DESC
